metadata.title: CVE-2019-20379 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: ganglia-web (aka Ganglia Web Frontend) through 3.7.5 allows XSS via the header.php cs parameter.

notes.note: sbeattie> See README.Debian.security, only supported behind an authenticated HTTP zone

criterions.comment: ganglia-web package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
